The viral image showing the wedding of a: Muslim couple was published by Coastal Digest, a Mangalore-based news website, in 2016. The image was not related to BJP leader Kapil Mishra's sister's wedding.
The same image was previously shared on: who falsely claimed that Kapil Mishra's sister married Shahzad Ali. This post was shared over 2,500 times.
Twitter user: Dkashfaque also tweeted the viral image with the same false claim, which was retweeted over 400 times.
